captions.text: Hey! Hey! Look at me. Look at me.
Alexander, look at me. It's me.
It's okay. You just slipped and you just fell in the pool, okay?

title: Final Exit - ALEXANDER COX, TARYN O'NEILL - BlackBoxTV

salvation, and coming back to consciousness was like being devoured by 
brain-crazy zombies? Shouldn't it be the opposite? Someone please, 
enlighten me! :)﻿

was to keep him from the light and wake up.

My realistic nightmare let me see ...... Oh yea i moved to a house there 
was a pool then one day my little brother feel in it it was terrifying for 
me and i couldn't swim but i didnt care i jumped in to save him and threw 
him to land (he was light like a feather ) but then i was worrying about me 
cus i couldnt swim then i saw the light my dad seeing how he died BOOM 
smoke everywhere and he whispered to me come champ and saw that i wasnt 
breathing i didnt want to but at the same time i did

comments.text:
When I was 5 I woke up in the middle of the night to get some water in the 
kitchen. I looked out the window which was over the sink. There was a giant 
glowing cracker-thing, the longer I looked outside more glowing things 
appeared. I even remember seeing Navi at the door. I backed up into the 
wall and I remember seeing white light and faces circling around me. I then 
woke up on that spot the next morning.
comments.author: toosecret2no

is my house and is chasing my, so any way my mom and my sister where in the 
car getting it started so I runnig I got outside jumped over like what felt 
like 6 gates ran to the car got in and we drove off. Later we can back had 
the police come to see if he was still there (which he wasnt) then I woke up

comments.author: Tamara Crawford

comments.text:
lock the door, and don't come out. As I ran into my room I heard her 
opening the door. I hid in the corner, absolutely terrified, and everything 
turned black. I am guessing that this dream was brought on by my friend 
texting me since she was thinking that someone was trying to kill her.
comments.author: Wonderlandinabox

comments.text:
Oooh, there have been so many realistic ones. Picking one, I would have to 
say the one that happened soon after I moved into a new house. It was late 
but I hadn't realized that I had fallen asleep so, being me, felt safe. It 
walked into the kitchen and asked my mom to make a burrito (odd late night 
craving). She had started to make it when there was a knock on our back 
door. No on ever uses that door so I was confused. My mother had a worried 
look and she ordered me to go to my room
comments.author: Wonderlandinabox
